job.name: TensorFlow_Demo_Prediction
job.description: Predict flower species using a previous trained model

task.name: Prediction
task.description: The simplest task, ran by a bash engine.

script.code:
n=$(curl https://api.keyvalue.xyz/3e0701bd/myKey) echo "key:[$n]"
docker exec $variables_CONTAINER_NAME /bin/sh -c 'curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sophiesongge/tensorflow_demo/master/image_prediction.py' docker exec $variables_CONTAINER_NAME /bin/sh -c "python image_prediction.py -i $variables_PREDICTION_PATH/$variables_PREDICTION_IMAGE -o test.jpg"
mkdir -p /tmp/$n mkdir -p /tmp/$n/output_images
docker cp $variables_CONTAINER_NAME:/root/test.jpg /tmp/$n/output_images/$variables_PREDICTION_IMAGE
